channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- Workstation and Fusion
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- Workstation and Fusion

item.title: CVE-2019-5541|2024-08-04T20:01:50.794Z -- vmware -- workstation%20and%20fusion
item.description: VMware Workstation (15.x before 15.5.1) and Fusion (11.x before 11.5.1) contain an out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the e1000e virtual network adapter. Successful exploitation of this issue may lead to code execution on the host from the guest or may allow attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on their own VM.

item.title: CVE-2019-5542|2024-08-04T20:01:50.748Z -- vmware -- workstation%20and%20fusion
item.description: VMware Workstation (15.x before 15.5.1) and Fusion (11.x before 11.5.1) contain a denial-of-service vulnerability in the RPC handler. Successful exploitation of this issue may allow attackers with normal user privileges to create a denial-of-service condition on their own VM.

item.title: CVE-2019-5540|2024-08-04T20:01:51.413Z -- vmware -- workstation%20and%20fusion
item.description: VMware Workstation (15.x before 15.5.1) and Fusion (11.x before 11.5.1) contain an information disclosure vulnerability in vmnetdhcp. Successful exploitation of this issue may allow an attacker on a guest VM to disclose sensitive information by leaking memory from the host process.
